functions.name: world_transformation
functions.docstring:
Produce a matrix that scales homogeneous coords in the specified ranges
to [0, 1], or [0, pb_aspect[i]] if the plotbox aspect ratio is specified.

functions.name: inv_transform
functions.docstring: Transform the points by the inverse of the projection matrix, *invM*.

functions.name: proj_transform
functions.docstring: Transform the points by the projection matrix *M*.
